mapper.select: SELECT f.store_id, s.name, s.image_path, COUNT(DISTINCT CONCAT(f.user_id, '_', f.store_id)) AS favorites, IFNULL(AVG(r.rating), 0) AS rating, COUNT(r.id) AS reviews FROM favorites f JOIN stores s ON f.store_id = s.id LEFT JOIN orders o ON o.store_id = s.id LEFT JOIN reviews r ON r.order_id = o.id WHERE f.user_id = #{userId} GROUP BY f.store_id ORDER BY f.store_id
